channel.title: Webclient
channel.description: Okay.. finally after weeks off coding... my server is finished... i now need to upload it to a webclient and i currently have no clue how? ... i have a html lay out for the webclient so the webpage is done... and i have jared and signed my client... so that's done, but when i load my webclient page the server doesn't run? it's a white screen? it'd be great if someone could add my msn: mutant138@hotmail.com and discuss how i can do this or tv me? thanks...

can u talk me through it via msn?

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

you need to .zip up your cache and have it somewhere and edit some code so that when they run your jar it checks and see if they have a cache if not it needs to download it and if you want it really advanced you have it check versions that way you can do automatic updates

Read full topic
